text:
RELIGION

Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple : Thirupallioda thiruvizha, Namperumal purappadu from sanctum sanctorum in pallakku, 6.30 a.m.; reaching Renga vilasa mandapam, 7.30 a.m.; purappadu from the mandapam in Hanumantha vaganam, 6.30 p.m.; reaching vagana mandapam, 7.45 p.m.; purappadu, 8.45 p.m.; reaching sanctum sanctorum, 9.15 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Hayagreevar Sannidhi, Sankar Nagar, Srirangam, 6 p.m.; Meadow Castle Residential Complex, Sankar Nagar, Srirangam, 7 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama nama parayanam, Amaravathi Street, Ayyappa Nagar, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

National College Department of Commerce : Seminar on HRM in banking- changes and challenges, J.Natarajan, General Manager (HRD), Karur Vysya Bank,inaugurates, 9.30 a.m.

Jamal Mohamed College : National conference on Graph Theory, Fuzzy Graph Theory and Their Applications, 10 a.m.; valedictory address by A.K.Khaja Nazeemudeen, college secretary, 3.15 p.m.

Government Arts College, Thuvakudi : Seminar on Energy Savings, P.Konthadaraman, former deputy general manager, BHEL, Tiruchi, and S.Mahadevan, energy consultant, PCRA, speak, 10.30 a.m.

Child Development Committee, Rotary International District 3000, St.John’s Vestry Anglo Indian Higher Secondary School and Mahatma Eye Hospital: ‘Feel the gift of sight,’ – awareness programme, A. Jaya, Mayor, chief guest, school campus, 10 a.m.

Rotary Clubs of Tiruchi Midtown and Rockcity: Talk on “Let us save the Earth,’ by G.Sundarrajan, Hotel Sangam, 7.30 p.m.

M.A.M.College of Engineering : Workshop on Innovative Electronics, K.C.Tamilventhan, Director, LIFT Technologies, resource person, 9.30 a.m.

Oxford Engineering College : Lecture on Smart engineering and design solution, Karthikeyan Rengasamy, solution architect, TCS, resource person, 10 a.m.

Kongunadu College of Engineering and Technology, Tholurpatti : Seminar on RF Antenna Design Using Feko Tool, 5.30 p.m.

Ordnance Factories Sports Promotion Board and Heavy Alloy Penetrator Project : All India Ordnance and Ordnance Equipment Factories inter-zonal badminton tournament, M.S.Ranganathan, Member, Ordnance Factories Board, distributes prizes, 9 a.m.

Bharathidasan University Department of Women’s Studies : National seminar on Women in Public Administration, B.Nalini, former professor, Madurai Kamaraj University, inaugurates, Manjula Rangarajan, Financial Advisor and Chief Accounts Officer, Southern Railway, delivers key note address, Khajamalai campus, 10.30 a.m.

Shivani College of Engineering and Technology : Blood grouping camp, 10.30 a.m.

Bishop Heber College : Awareness programme on alcoholism, Mullainagar, 6.30 p.m.; awareness programme on Women Rights, Sembattu, 6 p.m.; dental camp, LEAD Office, Srirangam, 2 p.m.

Rotaract Club of Mahalakshmi Engineering College : Installation of new office bearers, A.Alagappan, chief guest, 3 p.m.

St. Joseph’s College Department of Physical Education : Centenary tournaments – volleyball, 7 a.m.
title: tiruchi today
